bill_title: revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2003 to provide for additional personal services expenditure authority for the Board of Regents to cover health insurance rate increases.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2003 to provide for additional personal services expenditure authority for the Board of Regents to cover health insurance rate increases. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That section 14 of chapter 4 of the 2002 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS Regents Employee Compensation & Health Insurance Personal Services, delete "$4,463,879" and insert "$5,420,167". Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 2. This Act is effective June 11, 2003. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
